typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{1ereDateLivrDdee} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Article as string,
		{Type doc. vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as integer,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as integer,
		{CA facturé} as double,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> facturationAC
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> plateforme
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{1ereDateLivrDdee} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Article as string,
		{Type doc. vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as integer,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as integer,
		{CA facturé} as double,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> facturationAP
cleansing filter({Canal distribution}==42 || {Canal distribution}==51) ~> keep42and51
keep42and51 derive(fact_filter1 = iif( instr(lower({Type de facture}),"yfar")==0 && instr(lower({Motif commande}),"fas")==0, 0, 1),
		fact_filter2 = iif(instr(lower({Type de facture}),"yafb")==0 && instr(lower({Motif commande}),"fas")==0, 0, 1)) ~> factureFilter
facFilter, plateforme join(trim({Récept. de march.}, " ") == trim(HubSAPid, " "),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerPlateforme
innerPlateforme select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommonInner
prixMoyen sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Année civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> sort
dropColumns keyGenerate(output(ID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> addKey
addKey derive(ID = ID+1) ~> previousID
addKey, renameToPrevious join(ID == {previous ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinPreviousRow
sort derive(prix_unitaire = {CA facturé}/{Qté facturée}) ~> prixUnitaire
dropColumnsInCommonInner aggregate(groupBy(WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier}),
	{Qté facturée} = max({Qté facturée}),
		{CA facturé} = max({CA facturé})) ~> prixMoyen
prixUnitaire select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns
previousID select(mapColumn(
		{previous WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{previous Article} = Article,
		{previous Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{previous Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{previous prix_unitaire} = prix_unitaire,
		{previous ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToPrevious
addKey derive(ID = ID-1) ~> nextID
nextID select(mapColumn(
		{next WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{next Article} = Article,
		{next Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{next Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{next prix_unitaire} = prix_unitaire,
		{next ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToNext
joinPreviousRow, renameToNext join(ID == {next ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinNextRow
joinNextRow derive({Changement de période} = iif({previous Article}!=Article || {previous WholeSalerID}!=WholeSalerID || {previous Année civile}!={Année civile}, 
    1, 

    iif(abs(({previous prix_unitaire}-prix_unitaire)/{previous prix_unitaire})>0.1, 1, 0))) ~> changementDePeriode
changementDePeriode filter({Changement de période}==1) ~> changementDePeriodeFiltre
joinNewNextID derive({Durée_période} = iif(WholeSalerID=={previous WholeSalerID} && Article=={previous Article} && {Année civile}=={previous Année civile}
    , iif(WholeSalerID=={next WholeSalerID} && Article=={next Article} && {Année civile}=={next Année civile}
    
        , toString({Mois calendrier})+"/"+toString({Année civile})+"-"+toString({next Mois calendrier}-1)+"/"+toString({Année civile})
        
        , toString({Mois calendrier})+"/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile}))
    
    , iif(WholeSalerID=={next WholeSalerID} && Article=={next Article} && {Année civile}=={next Année civile}
        
        , "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-"+toString({next Mois calendrier}-1)+"/"+toString({Année civile})
        
        , "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile})))) ~> DureePeriode
UnionFacturation derive({Canal distribution} = toInteger({Canal distribution})) ~> cleansing
DureePeriode sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Année civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommon1
dropColumnsInCommon1 filter(!isNull(WholeSalerID) || !isNull(Article) || !isNull({Année civile}) || !isNull({Mois calendrier}) || !isNull(prix_unitaire) || !isNull({Durée_période})) ~> dropNULL
facFilter, plateforme join(trim({Récept. de march.}, " ") == trim(HubSAPid, " "),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftPlateforme
leftPlateforme filter(isNull(HubSAPid)) ~> leftOuterPlateforme
leftOuterPlateforme aggregate(groupBy(Article,
		{Année civile}),
	prix_unitaire = mean({CA facturé}/{Qté facturée})) ~> prixUnitaireLeft
prixUnitaireLeft derive({Durée_période} = "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile}),
		join = 1) ~> dureePeriodeLeft
plateforme aggregate(groupBy(WholeSalerID),
	HubName = max(WholeSalerHubID)) ~> uniqueWholeSalerID
uniqueWholeSalerID select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> drop
drop derive(join = 1) ~> join
dureePeriodeLeft, join join(dureePeriodeLeft@join == join@join,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période},
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommon
dropNULL select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns2
dropColumnsInCommon derive({Période} = 1) ~> addperiod
dropColumns2, averagePrix union(byName: true)~> Union1
factureFilter filter(fact_filter1==0 || fact_filter2==0) ~> facFilter
Sort2 keyGenerate(output(ID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> addNewKey
changementDePeriodeFiltre select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> deletePreviousAndNext
deletePreviousAndNext sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Année civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> Sort2
addNewKey derive(ID = ID-1) ~> nextNewID
nextNewID select(mapColumn(
		{next WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{next Article} = Article,
		{next Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{next Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{next ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToNextNew
addNewKey derive(ID = ID+1) ~> previousNewID
previousNewID select(mapColumn(
		{previous WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{previous Article} = Article,
		{previous Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{previous Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{previous ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToPreviousNew
addNewKey, renameToPreviousNew join(ID == {previous ID},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinNewPreviousID
joinNewPreviousID, renameToNextNew join(ID == {next ID},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinNewNextID
addperiod, dropColumns2 join(dropColumnsInCommon@WholeSalerID == dropColumns2@WholeSalerID
	&& dropColumnsInCommon@Article == dropColumns2@Article,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join2
join2 filter(isNull(dropColumns2@WholeSalerID) || isNull(dropColumns2@Article)) ~> leftJoin
leftJoin select(mapColumn(
		Article = dropColumnsInCommon@Article,
		prix_unitaire = dropColumnsInCommon@prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période} = dropColumnsInCommon@{Durée_période},
		WholeSalerID = dropColumnsInCommon@WholeSalerID,
		{Période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> averagePrix
facturationAC, facturationAP union(byName: true)~> UnionFacturation
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['TEMP_PRIX_PAR_PERIODE.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> dureePeriodeOutput

properties.description:
input: dossier VMC
traitement:
concat all file in vmc,
drop duplicate.
output referentiel VMC.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Material as string,
		{Description article} as string,
		VMC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'filename') ~> inputVMC
inputVMC derive(year = regexExtract(filename , '(\\d+)',1)) ~> extractYEAr
extractYEAr aggregate(groupBy(Material,
		year),
	VMC = first(VMC)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{SAUNIER DUVAL} as string,
		{208.0} as string,
		{Pièces détachées pour chauffage} as string,
		{05608600} as string,
		{5272.0} as string,
		{33.0} as string,
		{0.0} as string,
		{202008} as string,
		{2020} as string,
		{08} as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['referentiel_vmc.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> output

source(output(
		{DateDébutValidité} as string,
		{Date Prev Cde} as string,
		{Code projet} as string,
		Projet as string,
		Type as string,
		{CP projet} as string,
		{Ville projet} as string,
		NbLogement as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		Famille as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		{Prix de base} as string,
		{Prix DO} as string,
		{Prix pro} as string,
		{Prix total} as string,
		{Numéro interne 1} as string,
		Client as string,
		{Ville client} as string,
		{Type financement} as string,
		{Numéro interne 2} as string,
		{Négoce} as string,
		{Ville négoce} as string,
		{Statut offre} as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Groupe as string,
		Offre as string,
		{Date de maj statut} as string,
		{Numéro avant vente} as string,
		{Créateur offre} as string,
		{Commentaire interne} as string,
		{Offre dérogée} as string,
		{Contrat cadre} as string,
		{Offre nationale} as string,
		{Année Tarif} as string,
		PotentielP1N as string,
		PotentielP2N as string,
		PotentielP3N as string,
		PotentielP4N as string,
		PotentielP5N as string,
		PotentielP6N as string,
		{DateFinValidité} as string,
		CODE_CMI as string,
		NOM_CMI as string,
		CodeATC as string,
		DEEE as string,
		OffreSupprimee as string,
		{Date de création} as string,
		NomSignataire1 as string,
		NomSignataire2 as string,
		DateSignataire1 as string,
		DateSignataire2 as string,
		{DateDérogation} as string,
		Canal as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> stgOffre
source(output(
		{affecte/non_affecte} as string,
		{plateforme/vente directe} as string,
		{origine de la ligne} as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		{Code client livré} as string,
		{code client plateforme livree} as string,
		{code produit} as string,
		quantite as string,
		ca as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque as string,
		marque_code as string,
		canal_distribution_final as string,
		{nom du canal} as string,
		canal_final as string,
		document_vente as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé (vente directe)} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre (vente directe)} as string,
		{Facture (vente directe)} as string,
		{Type poste Facture (vente directe)} as string,
		no_offre as string,
		{ATC offre} as string,
		{ATC livré} as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		N1groupe as string,
		N2groupe as string,
		N3groupe as string,
		N4groupe as string,
		N5groupe as string,
		N6groupe as string,
		N7groupe as string,
		N1groupedesignation as string,
		N2groupedesignation as string,
		N3groupedesignation as string,
		N4groupedesignation as string,
		N5groupedesignation as string,
		N6groupedesignation as string,
		N7groupedesignation as string,
		N1localedesignation as string,
		N2localedesignation as string,
		N3localedesignation as string,
		N4localedesignation as string,
		N5localedesignation as string,
		N6localedesignation as string,
		N7localedesignation as string,
		N1locale as string,
		N2locale as string,
		N3locale as string,
		N4locale as string,
		N5locale as string,
		N6locale as string,
		N7locale as string,
		{Hiérarchgroupe} as string,
		{Hiérarchlocale} as string,
		{Numéro du compte} as string,
		{EPS_Nom du compte} as string,
		{EPS_Groupe cible/Typologie générale} as string,
		{EPS_Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée} as string,
		{EPS_Compte principal: Numéro du compte} as string,
		{EPS_Compte principal: Nom du compte} as string,
		Client as string,
		{Numéro client indirect} as string,
		CODE_CMI as string,
		NOM_CMI as string,
		{Nom du compte} as string,
		{Client Indirect_ Groupe cible/Typologie générale} as string,
		{Client Indirect_ Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée} as string,
		{Client Indirect_  Compte principal: Numéro du compte} as string,
		{Client Indirect_  Compte principal: Nom du compte} as string,
		{Client Direct - Hiérarchie N1 SAP } as string,
		{Client Direct - Hiérarchie N2 SAP } as string,
		{Client Indirect - Hiérarchie N1 SAP} as string,
		{Client Indirect - Hiérarchie N2 SAP} as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> baseCommerciale
DerivedColumn2 aggregate(groupBy(Offre,
		{Référence},
		Canal),
	{Statut offre} = first({Statut offre}),
		Responsable = first(Responsable),
		{Numéro interne 1} = first({Numéro interne 1}),
		{Négoce} = first({Négoce}),
		{Numéro interne 2} = first({Numéro interne 2}),
		{Quantité de l'offre} = sum(toInteger({Quantité})),
		{Date fin validité} = max({DateFinValidité})) ~> aggregationOffre
stgOffre filter(!isNull(Offre)) ~> offreNotNULLoffre
baseCommerciale filter(!isNull(no_offre) && canal_final=="Chantier") ~> offreNotNullBase
DerivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy({plateforme/vente directe},
		no_offre,
		{code produit},
		canal_final),
	{qte consommée} = sum(toInteger(quantite) ),
		{dernière facturation année} = max(toInteger(year)),
		{dernière facturation mois} = max(toInteger(month))) ~> aggregationBase
aggregationOffre, aggregationBase join(Offre == no_offre
	&& {Référence} == {code produit},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOffreBaseCom
leftOffreBaseCom derive({Date de dernière facturation de l'offre} = toString({dernière facturation année})+"-"+toString({dernière facturation mois})) ~> yearmonth
yearmonth select(mapColumn(
		{Num offre} = Offre,
		Canal,
		Produit = {Référence},
		{Quantité de l'offre},
		{Date fin validité},
		{Quantité consommée} = {qte consommée},
		{Date de dernière facturation de l'offre},
		{Statut offre},
		Responsable,
		{Numéro interne 1},
		{Négoce},
		{Numéro interne 2}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommonleft
aggregationOffre, aggregationBase join(Offre == no_offre
	&& {Référence} == {code produit},
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullRightOffreBaseCom
fullRightOffreBaseCom filter(isNull(Offre) || isNull({Référence})) ~> rightOffreBaseCom
rightOffreBaseCom select(mapColumn(
		{plateforme/vente directe},
		no_offre,
		{code produit},
		canal_final,
		{qte consommée},
		{dernière facturation année},
		{dernière facturation mois}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommonRight
offreNotNullBase derive({code produit} = iif(substring({code produit},1,2) == "00", substring({code produit},3,length({code produit})-2), {code produit}),
		no_offre = upper(no_offre)) ~> DerivedColumn1
offreNotNULLoffre derive({DateFinValidité} = split({DateFinValidité}, " ")[1]) ~> DerivedColumn2
dropColumnsInCommonleft sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SUIVIE_OFFRE_CHANTIER.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SUIVIEOFFRECHANTIER
dropColumnsInCommonRight sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		POSid as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		BrandID as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['offre_et_baseCom_sans_matching.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> offreEtBaseComSansMatching

source(output(
		{DateDébutValidité} as string,
		{Date Prev Cde} as string,
		{Code projet} as string,
		Projet as string,
		Type as string,
		{CP projet} as string,
		{Ville projet} as string,
		NbLogement as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		Famille as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		{Prix de base} as string,
		{Prix DO} as string,
		{Prix pro} as string,
		{Prix total} as string,
		{Numéro interne 1} as string,
		Client as string,
		{Ville client} as string,
		{Type financement} as string,
		{Numéro interne 2} as string,
		{Négoce} as string,
		{Ville négoce} as string,
		{Statut offre} as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Groupe as string,
		Offre as string,
		{Date de maj statut} as string,
		{Numéro avant vente} as string,

	allowSchemaDrift: true,

ecoulement select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal} = {code postal},
		marque_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns
avoir select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		Code_depot,
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> filterColumnsToUse
EccAddToReplicate split(in(["dsc",'tereva'],lower(distributeur)),
	disjoint: false) ~> filterDistrubitor@(dscTereva, notDscTereva)
filterColumnsToUse derive(toreplicate = abs( toInteger( Qte_Validee_VGF ) )) ~> AvoirAddToReplicate
dropColumns derive(toreplicate = abs(toInteger( qte_ecoulement )),
		agence_code = replace(agence_code, ".0", "")) ~> EccAddToReplicate
newColumns split(in(["2","7"], CompanyId),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(DscTerevaAvoir, NotDscTerevaAvoir)
salerDSC, OrgaTerevas union(byName: true)~> unionDSCTereva
unionDSCTereva aggregate(groupBy(POSid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		HubSAPid = last(HubSAPid)) ~> uniqueAgenceCode
AvoirAddToReplicate derive(ca_avoir = toFloat(PA_Valide_VGF),
		yearmonth = iif(toInteger(Mois)<10, {Année}+"0"+Mois  ,   {Année}+Mois  ),
		Qte_Validee_VGF = toInteger( Qte_Validee_VGF )) ~> newColumns
ReSelect, uniqueAgenceCode join(Agence == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> DscTerevaJoinOrganisation
ConditionalSplit1@DscTerevaAvoir select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,

		NoCli,

		yearmonth

filterDistrubitor@dscTereva derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(qte_ecoulement)), #index),
		rcount = 1) ~> dd
dd foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,

	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> ddToList

		agence_code,
		reference),
	asc(year, true),
	asc(agence_code, true),
	asc(reference, true),
	indexcols2 = rowNumber()) ~> Window1

	asc(reference, true),
	indexcols2 = rowNumber()) ~> Window2
positiveQuantite derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(Qte_Validee_VGF)), #index)) ~> dd3

		NoArtVGF),
	asc({Année}, true),
	asc(Agence, true),
	asc(NoArtVGF, true),
	indexcols2 = rowNumber()) ~> Window3

		month = substring(yearmonth, 5 ,2)) ~> yearAndMonth
yearAndMonth filter(isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNull

		{N° Département} = toString(byName('N° Département')),

		{Code point de vente},

		HubSAPid = trim(HubSAPid, " ")) ~> cleansing

		HubSAPid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		WholeSalerShortName = max(WholeSalerShortName),
		UnitID = max(UnitID),
		POSdescription = max(POSdescription),

		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		distributeur,
		Marque,
		{Canal final},
		Matricule,
		NomATC,
		ATC,
		Offre,
		{ATC performance}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameNoOffre
unionAvoir derive(distributeur = "Van Markes") ~> distributeur
selectAvoir filter(CompanyId=="11") ~> filtreCompany
filtreCompany derive(HubSAPid = "16004028") ~> setHubsID
REFATC select(mapColumn(
		Marque,
		{Code Postal début},
		{Code Postal fin},

		Fonction,
		{Département},

	),

	),

addDataorigin, endEPS join(POSSAMidString == client,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
JoinSAP, endEPS join(toInteger(POSSAMidString) == toInteger(endEPS@client),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
Join3 derive({Code postal} = coalesce(SelectSAP@{Code postal},endEPS@{Code postal})) ~> DerivedColumn1

		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,

		{Plan primes} = {Plan prime},
		Matricule = {ID SAP},
		DR
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renamle
renamle derive({Canal final} = iif( in(["Vaillant diffus","SD diffus",'Diffus'], {Plan primes}), "Diffus" ,"Chantier" ),
		toreplicate = {Code Postal fin}-{Code Postal début}+1) ~> canalFinal
canalFinal filter({Code Postal début}<= {Code Postal fin}) ~> filtreCodePostal
filtreCodePostal derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(toreplicate)), #index)) ~> dd
dd foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		Marque,
		{Code Postal début},
		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Département},
		ATC,
		NomATC = Utilisateur,
		{Plan primes},
		Matricule = ATC,
		{Canal final},
		toreplicate,
		dd,
		DR
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 derive(dd = toInteger(dd) -1) ~> dd1
dd1 derive({Code postal} = {Code Postal début}+dd) ~> codePostalUpdate
atcJoined derive({ID SAP} = toInteger({ID SAP})) ~> DerivedColumn1
canalFinal filter(ATC==16400015) ~> Filter1
renamle filter(ATC==16400015) ~> Filter3
codePostalUpdate filter(in(['Attaché commercial prescription','Attaché commercial réseau 2','Attaché commercial réseau' ], Fonction)) ~> Filter4
codePostalUpdate filter(in(['Conseiller Technique Thermodynamique' ,'Conseiller technique régional'], Fonction)) ~> Filter5

		Marque,
		{Code Postal début},
		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Département},
		IDSAP = ATC,
		Nom = NomATC,

		Matricule,

		toreplicate,
		dd,
		DR,
		{Code postal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,

Filter4 filter(!isNull(ATC)) ~> Filter6

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared afctationflows = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://dsvaillantfr.blob.core.windows.net/data-warehouse/Temp/atc_affectation_lower"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared atcc2021 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://dsvaillantfr.blob.core.windows.net/data-warehouse/Temp/atc_c2021_lower"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = afctationflows,
  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(Source, {"Clé Référentiel", "Marque", "Code Postal début", "Code Postal fin", "Utilisateur", "Fonction", "Département", "DR"})
in
  #"Choose columns";
